{{also|baum|Bäum}} ==Translingual== ===Proper noun=== {{mul-proper noun}} # A [[botanical]] [[plant]] name [[author]] [[abbreviation]] for [[botanist]] Hugo Baum (1866-1950). ===Further reading=== * [http://www.ipni.org/ipni/authorsearchpage.do Author query of the International Plant Names Index] [[Category:mul:Botanical author abbreviations]] ---- ==German== {{picdic |image=Birnbaum am Lerchenberg retouched.jpg |text=tree (1) |detail1= {{picdicimg|de|image=Brunfelsia pauciflora shrub.jpg|link=Pflanze}} |detail3= {{picdicimg|de|image=Roots by cesarpb.jpg|link=Wurzel}} {{picdicimg|de|image=Magnolia acuminata trunk.JPG|link=Stamm}} {{picdicimg|de|image=Ceiba sp branches.jpg|link=Ast}} {{picdicimg|de|image=Autumn Red Oak Leaf.jpg|link=Blatt}} {{picdicimg|de|image=Picea koyamae shoot.JPG|link=Nadel}} {{picdicimg|de|image=Fruit_Stall_in_Barcelona_Market.jpg|link=Frucht}} }} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|boum}}, from {{inh|de|goh|boum}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*baumaz}}. Akin to Dutch {{m|nl|boom}}, Low German {{m|nds|Boom}}, West Frisian {{m|fy|beam}}, English {{m|en|beam}}. Plural umlaut by proportional analogy with terms like {{m|de|Gast||guest}} to {{m|de|Gäste||guests}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/baʊ̯m/}} * {{audio|de|De-Baum.ogg|audio}} * {{rhymes|de|aʊ̯m}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Baumes|gen2=Baums|Bäume|Bäumchen|dim2=Bäumlein|dim3=Bäumelein}} # [[tree]] #: {{uxi|de|Vögel nisten gerne in '''Bäumen'''.|Birds like to nest in '''trees'''.}} #: {{ux|de|'''Bäume''' zählen zu den größten Lebensformen.|'''Trees''' are one of the biggest life forms on the planet.}} #: {{uxi|de|'''Baum''' fällt!|Timber!|lit='''Tree''' falling!}} # {{lb|de|nautical}} [[boom]] ====Usage notes==== * In German, one generally says: {{m|de||Er sitzt auf dem Baum|lit=He’s sitting on the tree}}, and accordingly: {{m|de||Sie klettert auf den Baum|lit=She’s climbing onto the tree}}. The construction with {{m|de|in}} (as in English) is not entirely impossible, but it is rare. There is a chance that it may be misunderstood as “inside a hollow tree trunk”. ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|(e)s|pl=Bäume}} ====Hypernyms==== * {{sense|tree}} {{l|de|Pflanze}} ====Hyponyms==== * {{sense|tree}} {{l|de|Eiche}}, {{l|de|Kastanie}} ====Derived terms==== {{col5|de |Affenbrotbaum|Apfelsinenbaum|Apfelbaum|Aprikosenbaum |baumartig|Baumast|Baumbast|baumbestanden|Baumgartner|Baumgrenze|Baumhaus|Baumhöhle|Baumkunde|Baumkrone|Baumkuchen|baumlang|baumlos|Baummarder|Baumralle|baumreich|Baumschule|Baumstumpf|Baumwiese|Baumwipfel|Baumwolle|baumwollen|Baumzapfen|Baumzweig |Birnbaum|Eichenbaum|Entscheidungsbaum|Erdbeerbaum|Feigenbaum|Flammenbaum|Gummibaum|Johannisbrotbaum|Kakaobaum|Kastanienbaum|Kirschbaum|Laubbaum|Maibaum|Mandelbaum|Nadelbaum|Obstbaum|Olivenbaum|Orangenbaum|Pfirsichbaum|Pflaumbaum|Stammbaum|Suchbaum|Tannenbaum|Weihnachtsbaum }} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:de:Trees]]
